tool_description: Performs conditional logic based on specified criteria. Allows for branching behavior with 'if' conditions.

arguments.description: The left-hand side of the condition

arguments.name: rhs
arguments.description: The right-hand side of the condition

arguments.name: if_true
arguments.description: The set of tools to be executed if the condition is true. Use $$PREV[i] to reference the value of the ith tool in the chain.
